title: Movie Recommendation System
description: I developed a personalized movie recommendation system that suggests movies based on user preferences and similar content. The system was built using a content-based filtering approach, utilizing movie metadata such as genres, cast, crew, and plot descriptions to provide relevant recommendations.

title: Sales Insight
description: I Developed an interactive Sales Insights Dashboard using Power BI to provide comprehensive data-driven insights into sales performance. The dashboard was designed to enable sales teams and management to make informed decisions based on real-time analytics, trend analysis, and key performance indicators (KPIs).

title: Hotel Insight
description: I Developed a comprehensive Power BI dashboard to provide actionable insights into hotel performance, customer behavior, and key operational metrics. The project aimed to improve decision-making in hotel management by visualizing critical KPIs such as occupancy rates, revenue per available room (RevPAR), average daily rate (ADR), customer satisfaction, and booking trends.
